EmailTemplate.name: ESB-2017-9-13-Boston-ESB-Last Chance 2.EM-2017-09-13-Boston-Last Chance 2
EmailTemplate.subject: September 21st Dinner at Harvard Club of Boston
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Friend}},
Next week, Presidio and Turbonomic will be hosting the Boston Executive Networking Dinner: <[[https://turbonomic.com/learn-boston/]]> Elastic Compute at Cloud Economics on Thursday, September 21st 2017 at the Downtown Harvard Club of Boston at 5:00PM EST.
There are very limited seats available and I wanted to make sure that you had a moment to RSVP <[[https://turbonomic.com/learn-boston/]]>. Many renown New England Executives will be in attendance to network and exchange ideas around hybrid and public cloud strategies.
After a dinner full of hybrid cloud discussion (and Executive Chef Dean A. Moore critically acclaimed menu) all attendees will be treated to a home automation kit encompassing of an Amazon Echo or a Nest Thermostat.
While you RSVP <[[https://turbonomic.com/learn-boston/]]>, take a sneak peek at the amazing partnership we, at Turbonomic have forged with BMC <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A_IGHTGVR6U&t=12s]]>. Listen to how Scott Crowder utilizes Turbonomic to increase overall capacity by 25% and drive “performance through the roof”.
What: Boston Executive Networking Dinner: <[[https://turbonomic.com/learn-boston/]]> Elastic Compute at Cloud Economics Where: Downtown Harvard Club of Boston; 1 Federal St. Boston, MA 02110 When: Thursday, September 21st, 2017 5:00PM EST RSVP: https://turbonomic.com/learn-boston/ <[[https://turbonomic.com/learn-boston/]]>
Yours sincerely,
Maria Rodriguez; Turbonomic, Inc.
